The Orange Community Garden

The Orange Community Garden provides a place in our community for people to grow plants, practice sustainability and build strong relationships.

Save Our Garden!

The city of Orange wants to shut down the community garden program at the end of 2011. Help us save our garden by spreading the word to your friends and family and by signing this petition so we can show the city that this program is valued by its community and their family and friends.

Spread the Word

Share our cause on Twitter, Facebook or via email using the links below.
